message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper discusses the design of a modular intelligent search system for articles written in Albanian, with a focus on the recommender module that facilitates searching by providing relevant articles to the users. This involves the use of cosine similarity based heuristics to differentiate the importance of term frequencies based on their location in the article. This work is related to information retrieval (cs.IR), natural language processing (cs.CL), deep learning (cs.DL), machine learning (cs.LG), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
